name: A Forest Walk
description:
Watch the devlog for this game here!

You wake up on the outskirts of a strange forest knowing only one thing... you have to get home. The forest is perilous—strange thing, though: each time you die, you just get stronger.

Hi! I'm KalechippsDev, an indie game developer and college student. Thanks for checking out this combat demo game which I developed over the course of a year in my free time. If you're interested in the development process, head over to my Youtube channel, and leave a comment letting me know what you thought of the game!

Controls

WASD – Move

Shift – Dash

Left-click – Sword slash

Right-click – Bow shot

Hold K – Die (in case you get stuck)

Music

Midnight Tale by Kevin MacLeod
